p: All the medicinal plants reported in the current review work have been used in Saudi traditional medicine for the treatment of different human diseases. However, the investigated plants in the present review need further studies covering specific screening of natural products, pharmacological and biological activities as well as a safety control. These Data Open window for Researches to use it and develop new molecules as well as, to continue studying the effects of extracts and isolated chemicals derived from these plants for their health benefits, in important diseases.
